item.title: Building a Spotify Recommendation Model With R
item.description: Author: Ed Orlando Problem Statement This tutorial shows you how to create a Spotify Recommendation Algorithm using the recommenderlab() and arules() packages. Load Libraries To get started, first load the libbraries listed below. # Core & Viz library(tidyverse) library(tidyquant) library(plotly) # Modeling library(recommenderlab) library(arules) library(arulesViz) Load Data The data was previously downloaded and organized. The data was orignally downloaded using Exportify. playlist_tbl <- read_csv2("Data_Sources/2020_05_20_Spotify_Playlist_Data/all_playlists.csv") Viewing the Data The data consists of ~100K songs and inlude You may view the data here
